prompt:
You are a product taxonomy extraction specialist.

You are tasked with categorizing products that should belong to the "Light Switches" category into more specific subcategories.

**INPUT FORMAT:**
Given lines of the form: [<ID>] <title>

**REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT:**
Return **pure JSON only** (no explanations, no markdown, no code blocks):
{
  "Meaningful Subcategory 1 (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)": {
    "definition": "..., e.g. <specific product subtypes (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)>",
    "ids": [0, 5, 12]
  },
  "Meaningful Subcategory 2": {
    "definition": "..., e.g. ...",
    "ids": [1, 8, 15]
  },
  "OUT_OF_SCOPE": {
    "definition": "Products that clearly don't belong to Light Switches, e.g. ...",
    "ids": [3, 9]
  }
}

**CRITICAL RULES:**

**Data Integrity & Completeness:**
1. **Complete & No Duplicate ID**: Every ID from the input must appear exactly once in the "ids" arrays - no ID can be missing or duplicated
2. **ID Accuracy**: Use only the exact IDs from the input - never invent or modify them

**Output Format:**
3. **Format**: Pure JSON object only - no surrounding text or formatting
4. **Definitions**: Each category must have a "definition" field with a brief description ending with "e.g." and specific product subtypes (NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names)

**Categorization Logic:**
5. **Categories & Mutual Exclusivity**: Create meaningful subcategories (words separated by spaces) for legitimate "Light Switches" products; NEVER include brand names, model numbers, or proprietary product line names; each subcategory must represent a SINGULAR, SPECIFIC concept with NO OVERLAP between categories - each product can only belong to ONE subcategory with clear boundaries
6. **OUT_OF_SCOPE Usage**: Use this special category for products that aren't even remotely related to "Light Switches" - use "OUT_OF_SCOPE" as the last resort
7. **Categorization Basis**: Group similar products within "Light Switches" by their key distinguishing features based on functionality or features

**Category Quality:**
8. **Consistent Granularity**: All subcategories must be at the same level of specificity - avoid mixing broad categories with narrow ones
9. **Precise Terminology**: Use precise, specific terms - avoid generic words like "specialty", "miscellaneous", "other"
10. **Category Atomicity**: Avoid conjunctions and compound categories - create separate distinct categories instead=== RETRY REQUIRED ===

**Completeness Errors:**
- Missing IDs: [10]

**YOUR PREVIOUS JSON ATTEMPT:**
{
  "Single Pole Toggle Switches": {
    "definition": "Single pole toggle switches with traditional flip-style actuators for basic on/off lighting control, e.g. standard toggle switches, illuminated toggle switches, heavy duty toggle switches",
    "ids": [8, 19, 23, 25, 26]
  },
  "Single Pole Rocker Switches": {
    "definition": "Single pole rocker switches with paddle-style actuators for basic on/off lighting control, e.g. decorator rocker switches, paddle switches, illuminated rocker switches",
    "ids": [0, 14, 15, 24, 30, 31]
  },
  "Three Way Switches": {
    "definition": "Three way switches that allow control of lighting from two different locations, e.g. three way toggle switches, three way rocker switches, three way decorator switches",
    "ids": [16, 35]
  },
  "Four Way Switches": {
    "definition": "Four way switches that work with three way switches to control lighting from three or more locations, e.g. four way rocker switches, four way decorator switches",
    "ids": [32]
  },
  "Combination Switches": {
    "definition": "Switches that combine multiple switching functions or switch with outlet in a single device, e.g. dual switches, switch outlet combinations, multi-function switches",
    "ids": [7, 9, 11, 27, 33, 34]
  },
  "Smart Switches": {
    "definition": "WiFi or wireless enabled switches that can be controlled remotely via smartphone apps or voice assistants, e.g. WiFi switches, smart home switches, app controlled switches",
    "ids": [13, 17, 18, 22, 29]
  },
  "OUT_OF_SCOPE": {
    "definition": "Products that clearly don't belong to Light Switches, e.g. electrical outlets, wall plates, electrical boxes, plugs, weatherproof covers, ceiling fans, wall sconces, transfer switches, time switches, cord switches, disconnect switches",
    "ids": [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 12, 20, 21, 28, 36, 37]
  }
}

**MISSING PRODUCTS TO CATEGORIZE:**
[10] radiant TM870WSLCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch with Locator Light, Single Pole Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)


Please analyze the errors above and provide a corrected response that addresses all the issues. Make sure to:
- Follow the exact JSON schema required
- Fix all validation errors listed above
- Provide complete and valid JSON

=== END RETRY INSTRUCTIONS ===
